Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Kids get so happy when
you give them some candy.
It's cute to watch.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think the candy house really
reflected my personality.
Don't you agree, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone seemed really happy,
so that really made it worthwhile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If anyone dared to
complain about my work, I'd have
to put them in their place.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we get married, then our
kids will someday participate
in this Festival.
<PAGE>
If they do, I'm definitely going to
make them the biggest, most
amazing candy house ever.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm getting ahead of myself?
I don't know, I don't think that
it's that far off in the future...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think that our candy house
came out pretty well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The love between us
really makes these amazing
feats possible.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When you and I put our
talents to work, making a
candy house is a piece of cake.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The kids liked it too.
Next year, we'll make an
even better one!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I used to get candy from the
Pumpkin Festival when I was
a kid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What kind of kid was I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That's hard to answer.
I was just a normal kid, you know?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder why they call this
the Pumpkin Festival?
<PAGE>
I mean, we give out a bunch
of candy, but we never give
out any pumpkins, right?
<PAGE>
Maybe they give out pumpkins
in other towns.
NoMsg

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We should have plenty of people
to build a candy house.
<PAGE>
If we had a few more people,
we could build an even
bigger one though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has grown so much.
When I was kid, there were
far fewer people here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's nice to have a
lot of people celebrating.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone was so happy!
Our efforts really paid off♪
<PAGE>
I can't wait to do it again,
so we can see everyone smile!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Pumpkin Festival was a
great success this year!
I'm glad everyone had fun!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was so much fun to make
a candy house with you,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
The kids had a lot of fun too.
What a great Pumpkin Festival♪
<PAGE>
Let's do this again next year!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you and I get married,
and we have kids, then they're
going to come to this festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When that happens, I'm
going to make them the biggest
candy house of all time♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Haha, maybe I'm getting
a bit ahead of myself.
Sorry!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our candy house really
came out well!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's totally a sign that
we work great together as a
husband and wife♪
<PAGE>
I think that our bond grew
even stronger after today.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, <MYNAME>.
The candy house came out
really nicely.
<PAGE>
I'm so blessed to have a wife
that's awesome at cooking!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Man, I'm so full!
I don't think I can eat any dinner.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Huh? You don't think that
I ate that much?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Well, I kind of ate some
candy while we were making
the candy house today.
<PAGE>
It just looked so amazingly delicious!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I kind of regret it now though.
I'm so full of candy that
I'm starting to feel dizzy...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you were a kid, didn't you
want to eat your way through
a candy house? I sure did!
<PAGE>
That's why I really loved it when
I came to the Pumpkin Festival for
the first time!
<PAGE>
I've always wanted to come here
and make a candy house for
the kids that show up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's why I was
really glad that I was able
to come here today!
NoMsg

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Pumpkin Festival is
really popular in this town!
<PAGE>
I can't even imagine what it
would be like if there were
more people here!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is just getting
more and more popular.
<PAGE>
So many people gather for the
festivals, and the kids love it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's all thanks to you, <MYNAME>.
You're really amazing!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The kids were all beaming today.
It was really great to make
the candy house for them.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be honest, it was pretty
tiring to make that house...
<PAGE>
But seeing the kids smile
made me forget about all of that.
<PAGE>
The smile of a child is like,
the most powerful thing ever.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was fun making a candy house
with you today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
The kids loved it, so I'd say
that the Pumpkin Festival was
a success.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you and I get married and
have kids, then they're going
to go to the Pumpkin Festival.
<PAGE>
When that happens, we're going
to make them the best 
candy house of all time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You think I'm jumping the
gun a bit? I don't know, I think
it might happen soon...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our candy house really
came out nicely.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This is like, the power
of our marriage in action.
I guess everyone else helped too.
<PAGE>
Let's do this again next year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When were building the candy house...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think that everyone
was amazed at how in sync you
and I were!
<PAGE>
That's the power of love.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So all the adults get together,
and work together to build the
kids a candy house.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The Pumpkin Festival
is like, the greatest!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town I grew up in didn't
do anything like the Pumpkin
Festival when I was a kid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I didn't know anything about
it when I first came here,
to be honest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I wonder why my old town
never adopted this wonderful
festival?
NoMsg

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The kids must be thrilled to have
so many people at the festival.
<PAGE>
I bet that we could get
more people to show up though.
<PAGE>
Naturally, we should get more
adults together...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But wouldn't it be great
to have more kids here too,
to join in on all the fun?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There aren't too many towns that
have such a vibrant and exciting
Pumpkin Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm going to have to
make one amazing candy house!
<PAGE>
We just need to make sure that
everyone gets enough candy.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everybody seemed to enjoy
the candy house today.
<PAGE>
Seeing their happiness really
makes everything worthwhile.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone was so happy today.
<PAGE>
It's nice to be reminded
why we work so hard in the
first place.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was great fun to make
the candy house today with
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
The children were very excited.
I'd say the Pumpkin Festival was
a great success.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you and I were to get
married, and have children...
<PAGE>
They would someday attend this
very festival, wouldn't they?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When that happens,
we'll have to make them the
best candy house they've ever...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>......oh, I'm sorry!
I'm really getting ahead of
myself here!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The candy house really
came out nicely, didn't it?
<PAGE>
Everyone worked hard, although
I'd like to think that we in
particular were able to work together.
<PAGE>
I don't know why, but I feel
much closer to you today,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Let's be sure to do this
again next year.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
The candy house looked
absolutely delicious.
<PAGE>
I'm so fortunate to be married to
someone with amazing cooking skills.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Making a candy house is
more labor intensive that I
thought.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Now that the festival has ended,
I'm feeling quite exhausted!
<PAGE>
Granting children their dreams
is very hard work, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Next year, perhaps I'll work
on my fitness before
the Pumpkin Festival.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Amir attended a Pumpkin Festival
a long time ago, when he was
just a child himself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>As a prince, he was unable
to celebrate with those who were
not part of the royal family.
<PAGE>
However, he did receive many presents
and messages from well-wishers.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Now that I think about it,
I'm sure that he would have traded
all of those gifts...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...for the opportunity to
celebrate with his friends and
family all around him.
NoMsg
NoMsg

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The children must be so excited
to celebrate with so many people.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you first arrived,
I've heard that there weren't
this many people here.
<PAGE>
I can't say that I know
how things were back then...
<PAGE>
It's amazing how far along
the town has come.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Those kids seemed really happy.
It's cool that they really
appreciated it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I ate too many sweets...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I don't think that we
ALL have to eat candy just
because it's the Pumpkin Festival.
<PAGE>
Well, I guess it's for the kids.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it was kind of
fun to build that candy house
with you today.
<PAGE>
The kids had fun too.
I'd call this Pumpkin Festival
a success.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you and I get married,
we'll have a kid, and they'll
attend this festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have to make the
biggest candy house ever
for them when that day comes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Um...I'm just talking about
how things might turn out.
...Just forget I said that, OK?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That candy house came
out nicely.
<PAGE>
You really went all out today.
<PAGE>
I saw you and the attention
you paid to the details.
You were totally in the zone.
<PAGE>
It was pretty funny to watch.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It takes a lot of work to
make a candy house.
<PAGE>
Of course, with the amount of
work that I'm used to, it's
really a piece of cake.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The kids were happy.
Next year, we'll make one
that's even better.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Every inch of my body
smells like sugar.
<PAGE>
Just the smell of it is
giving me heartburn...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've never been a fan of the
Pumpkin Festival, because
I'm not big on sweets.
<PAGE>
I mean, all day long, all
you can smell is sugar
and stuff like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It totally gives me
heartburn...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I really think
that we should have more people.
<PAGE>
It's like a birthday party.
It doesn't feel like the
whole town is here...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town has gotten a
lot bigger recently.
<PAGE>
The Pumpkin Festival used
to be just a small little
gathering.
<PAGE>
Now it feels like a real festival.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The town has gotten so much
livelier since you first
came here, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I can't even remember what
it was like back then.
<PAGE>
The kids are having way
more fun these days.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The children were so happy.
<PAGE>
I hope that they don't get
sick from consuming so
much of that candy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A child's smile is very
good for the soul.
<PAGE>
Next year, we'll do even better,
so that even more children
can smile for us.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was fun to build the
candy house with you
today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
The children seemed to have
a wonderful time.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we get married and have
children of our own, someday
they will attend this festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'd like to build them
the most majestic candy house
that they've ever seen.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...I'm sorry! I got
a bit ahead of myself there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But you know, I'd 
like for that to come true.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The candy house came out
really well.
<PAGE>
We really worked well together,
although I suppose everyone else
pitched in too!
<PAGE>
I think that I feel
much closer to you now.
<PAGE>
I'd love to come back and
do it again next year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
The candy house was
quite fantastic.
<PAGE>
I'm very lucky to have such
a talented wife.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I sent some candy from the
festival to my sister
yesterday.
<PAGE>
It should arrive there
by today...
<PAGE>
I hope that she is as happy
as those children were today.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never been to such a
jovial Pumpkin Festival.
<PAGE>
Back home, I was only able to
celebrate with my family.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The children in this town
are truly blessed to be able to
have such a wonderful event.
NoMsg
NoMsg

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This festival has so much
energy and vibrancy.
<PAGE>
The children here must really
love to partake in this.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everybody looked so happy!
I took a ton of pictures!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone seemed really
happy to be able to eat
all of that candy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had a lot of fun making
that candy house with you,
<MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
The kids were so happy!
What a great Pumpkin Festival!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, if we get married
and have kids, then they're
going to come to this festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>We're going to have to
make them one amazing candy house!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Haha, gosh what am I saying?
I'm so embarrassed now!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad the candy house
turned out so well!
<PAGE>
We all pitched in, but I think
that our strong bond
really helped!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I think that we're even
closer to each other than
we were before today!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The candy house was pretty
delicate, I thought that it
might collapse...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're really amazing,
<MYNAME>, you put it together
so well!
<PAGE>
It's really great to have
such a skilled husband!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used to love the Pumpkin
Festival when I was young.
<PAGE>
There's the awesome candy house,
plus you can eat all the
sweets you can handle!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Besides my birthday,
this was the best day
of the year!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone looked so happy
today, I had to take
so many pictures!
<PAGE>
Not for articles though,
they're just for the memories♪
NoMsg

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope that more and more
people come to our town.
<PAGE>
Then we can make a
really big candy house
for all the kids♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The kids looked so happy
at the festival today!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's all thanks to you
for attracting all of these
people to this town!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your hard work paid off.
All of the kids seemed
really happy today.
<PAGE>
Next year, we should try
to make an even bigger
candy house<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmm...those sweets
were delicious<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
The kids all seemed to have
a lot of fun too♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it was a lot of
fun making that candy house
with you<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
The kids all seemed to have
a lot of fun as well♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you and I get married,
our kids will come to
this festival, won't they?
<PAGE>
We'll have to build them
the biggest candy house that
they've ever seen♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Maybe I'm getting ahead of
myself, but I'd really like it
if that were to happen<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Kids are so simple, just
give them candy and they're
happy for the whole day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I have to say, their
happiness is quite contagious.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, let's do this
again next year.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know how delicate that
candy house is, so I'm glad
that it held together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You were really good
at building it!
<PAGE>
I'm so lucky to have such
a crafty husband<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've seen many Pumpkin
Festivals at different towns.
<PAGE>
It's rare to see the entire
town celebrate together like
this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think that it's great.
I adore the way this town
comes together.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never been able to
celebrate this festival myself.
<PAGE>
I was a bit jealous of the
other kids who got to
participate.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think that it would be
great if every town could
celebrate like they do here.
NoMsg

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we had a few more people,
it would be easier for everyone.
<PAGE>
We could even build a
larger candy house!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hopefully, we'll have
more people here next year♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, it occurred to me
while we were building the
candy house today...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>There are so many
more people in this town now.
<PAGE>
Building a candy house isn't
so tiring these days<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone was happy today.
It was worth the effort.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was nice to see the
children so happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I hope they don't
get cavities from all that
candy.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I had fun making
the candy house with you.
<PAGE>
The kids...
They seemed happy too.
The festival was a success.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, if you and I
get married, our kids will
come to this festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's build them
the biggest candy house
that they've ever seen.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Am I getting ahead of myself?
...I hope it comes true though.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When we were building the
candy house, everyone said that
we got along great.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I didn't really think about
it, but I hope that they're
right about what they said...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was worried that the candy
house would just collapse.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You really built it
well though, that house was
super sturdy.
<PAGE>
I can't believe that I have
such a reliable, talented
husband...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we have candy houses,
why can't we have candy
clothing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Not clothing made out of
candy. Maybe a hat shaped like
something sweet. Yeah, that works...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The Pumpkin Festival is for
kids, but I wonder if there's
a festival for adults?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Although, what would
make all of the adults smile
as much as those kids did?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Maybe that's why there
isn't a festival for adults.
NoMsg

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There were a lot of people today.
When I first came here, there
weren't as many folks around.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It could get hard to
remember everyone's names
eventually...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There were a lot of people
at the festival today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm afraid that I can't
remember everyone's name
anymore...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everybody seemed to really
enjoy the candy house that
we built today.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't help but smile when
I'm surrounded by all of those
happy children.
<PAGE>
I didn't even feel tired.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was fun to build the
candy house with you today.
<PAGE>
I think that the Pumpkin
Festival was a great success.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you and I get married,
then our children will
someday attend this festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Wouldn't it be nice
to build them the biggest
candy house they've ever seen?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>My goodness, what am I saying?
I'm so embarrassed right now,
forget I said anything!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The candy house turned out
really well today.
<PAGE>
I think that our bond
as a husband and wife
really helped us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I feel even closer
to you than I did before,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I hope that I'm not
the only one...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was afraid that the house
would come tumbling down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You really did an
excellent job at putting
everything together today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm quite lucky to
have such a wonderful husband.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can smell sweets
everywhere you go.
<PAGE>
It's wonderful for those
who like sweets...
<PAGE>
But for those who don't,
it must be tough to bear.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder who first started
the Pumpkin Festival?
<PAGE>
Whomever it was, they can
be credited with making children
everywhere brim with happiness.
<PAGE>
We should be grateful
to that person.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a bit somber here,
with only this many people.
<PAGE>
Next year, maybe we'll have
more people come to the festival.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
He's having fun, but I'm sure
that Toni would like to have
more children around as well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I hope that next year,
there will be many more
children here to enjoy this.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think that the town has
become much more lively
these days.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The children seem to
be having great fun too.
<PAGE>
Let's hope that this wonderful
trend continues.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The candy house was
very delicious<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
The children were so happy
as well! Let's do this again
next year!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone was so happy!
